title: Hi, On a telephone phone near the railroad tracks on Front Street (next to the apartment complex South Font) there is a blue box with a black circle on it.  Do you have any idea what it is? Just curious.  I drive by it every day and just wonder what it is.  Thanks so much!! So glad you are back!
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/11/blue-box-utility-pole-south-front-street/
